div.p: The major volatile compounds of essential oil of Satureja macrostema were caryophyllene, limonene, linalool, pulegone, menthone and thymol
The essential oil of S. macrostema showed a high free radical scavenging
Thymol exerted the highest antioxidant capacity by DPPH, ABTS and TAC methods.

sec.p: Abbreviations used: GC: Gas Chromatography; DPPH: 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl; ABTS: 2,2â€™-azino-bis-3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid; TAC: Total antioxidant capacity.
